text: Chelo Alonso (10 April 1933 – 20 February 2019) was a Cuban-born Italian actress. She was born in Camagüey, Cuba. Alonso was known for her roles in Goliath and the Barbarians, Morgan the Pirate and in Run, Man, Run. Alonso died on February 20, 2019 in Mentana, Italy from complications of Parkinson's disease at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Chelo Alonso on Cult Sirens * Chelo Alonso on Java's Bachelor Pad * Chelo Alonso on Glamour Girls of the Silver Screen Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Havana Category:People from Tuscany
title: Chelo Alonso
